text.text: You're getting very close. In fact, you're almost at my tower.
There is still time to turn back, you know.

replies.text: You stole from me. I will destroy you!
Not until you return what you stole.
You know, you don't have to be a villain.

text.text: What? What would you have me do?
text.reply: Be nice? Maybe do a good deed?

text.text: But I am a villain. I do not do good deeds.
text.reply: We all choose how to behave.

replies.text: I didn't choose vengeance. You can choose too.
